name: lava lich speed platformer
description:
Explore different paths while platforming over rising lava, and collecting wisps that make you move faster and jump higher.  Different paths will close off if you take too long, but also new paths will open as you're able to traverse new terrain with extra wisps. You will die plenty of times before finding right path. The goal is to eventually reach the portal.

download the game (both .exe and .pck file on windows) for better performance and resolution.

written in godot

 Feedback is welcome!
